FROM node:8.11

# Install nodemon
RUN npm install -g nodemon && npm cache clean --force;

# Create app directory
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

# Install app dependencies
COPY package.json .
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
